name: CL_RMT_ENTITY_INFO
description: This table contains the payor and payee information from the remittance file.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record.

columns.name: ENTITY_ID_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual.

columns.name: ENTITY_ID_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code
entries: Health Care Financing Administration National PlanID
Health Care Financing Administration National Provider Identifier

columns.name: ENTITY_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Code identifying a party or other code

columns.name: ENTITY_STATE
columns.description: Entity's Standard State/Province as defined by appropriate government agency

columns.name: ENTITY_ZIPCODE
columns.description: Entity's ZIP code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (ZIP code for United States)

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.
